text: Jacques Decaux (9 March 1918 - 2003) was a French sports shooter. He competed in the 25 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2003 deaths Category:French male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of France Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Aigle District
title: Jacques Decaux
